How to reinstate policy if cancelled mid-term?,"If policy is cancelled mid-term: insured has 10 days to reinstate without a lapse
insured has an additional 10 days to reinstate with a lapse (reinstatement fee will apply)

See the cancel invoice for the dates and details",kaD4T000000XmdlUAC,"kaD4T0000004N2iUAE,kaD4T0000008V52UAE,kaD4T0000009deUUAQ,kaD4T0000008nheUAA,kaD4T0000008YpEUAU"," To reinstate a policy that has been cancelled mid-term, you will need to contact your insurance company as soon as possible.
They will be able to walk you through the process and let you know what documentation and information you will need to provide.
In general, you will need to pay the full amount of the premium that was due at the time of cancellation, as well as any late fees or other charges that may have been incurred.
You may also need to provide proof of insurability, such as a new driver's license or a medical exam.
Once you have provided all of the required information and paid the necessary fees, your policy will be reinstated and you will be covered again.
,This answer appears to have come from the internet and not the knowledge content,pass,Farmers Specialty Auto,**Reinstatement after a Mid-Term Cancellation for Non-Payment**
- The insured has up to 11 calendar days to reinstate a policy canceled mid-term for non-payment.
- For example, a policy canceled on April 1, 2021, would have until April 11, 2021, to make payment to reinstate with a lapse.",kaD4T0000008nheUAA
How do I stop pay a refund check?,"1.
column2: Review When would a refund check be voided?
Verify that the check has not been cashed.  See How to Check the Status of a Refund Check
Refund was cashed:  It cannot be voided.
Refund was not cashed:  Proceed to step 3
For a reissue:
Verify that it has been 10 business days since issued and the insured still has not received it.
Advise the caller not to cash the original if received and document the policy
Document the SR rather than the Void/Stop Form
Note:  This documentation is required even when the insured states the check is damaged, was not received, or lost.

Complete BW Void/Stop Payment Request form in SRM.  Note:  If there are multiple checks to be voided, one void/stop form is sufficient.  Document the additional check numbers in the Other Special Instructions section.
Choose ""Returned Premium- Re-Apply"" to reapply refund to policy

column1: o
column2: If the policy is to be reinstated due to accepting a payment less than what was required, document the request or follow up on the policy to verity it has been reinstated.
Choose ""Returned Premium-  Re-Issue"" to reissue and enter correct address to send to.
Issuing to a new address:

column1: o
column2: Add diary comment to AS400 with new address
Address or Name on check is requested to be updated:

column1: o
column2: Confirm in notes it has not already been edited by finance (address/name edits are not always reflected on the Check Number Assigned Screen; but will be in diary comments.)

column1: o
column2: When the refund is issuing the same and the payment needs to be transferred but ""transfer"" cannot be hit to transfer the funds, submit a Void/Stop form.  In the event the refund check number has not generated yet, submit a Billing Action Needed form and Expedite the request.
How to Reapply a Same Day Refund to a Policy
Add special instructions to include confirmation original has not cleared and the insured will be advised not to cash if received.
Add diary comment to include advising not to cash original, that it has been verified as not having cleared
Refer SR
Process can take 1-2 business days
How long does it take to void and reissue a refund check?

column1: ,kaD4T000000Cnw2UAC,kaD4T000000XhogUAC,kaD4T000000CnsjUAC,kaD4T000000Xif9UAC,kaD4T000000Cnw2UAC,kaD4T000000XfWVUA0"," To stop payment on a refund check, you will need to:
1. Advise the agent or named insured not to attempt to cash the original check.
2. Process Void Stop pay request via Mellon Bank.
3. Process void via AS400.
4. Diary comment policy: ""Processed Void Stop Pay request to ReIssue refund to NI"".
5. Save Word document screen shots to shared Z drive: Operations/Accounting Services/Accounting Services/Void check_Stop pay/2Void Stop Pays/Year void stop pays/month void stop pays
,Both expected and referred article has info for the question,pass,Bristol West,**How to Process a Refund Void Stop Pay Request**
**Step 1: Create a Word Document**
- Title the document with the current date, ""Void Stop,"" and your initials.
**Step 2: Review Diary Comments and Void Stop Pay Request**
- Ensure at least one comment states the agent or named insured was advised not to cash the original check.
- If not noted, the request cannot be processed.
**Step 3: Process the Void via AS400**
- Take a screenshot and copy it to the Word document before finalizing the AS400 void.
**Step 4: Reapply a Same-Day Refund to a Policy**
- The Diary Comment policy should state: ""Processed Void Stop Pay request to Reapply refund to policy.""
**Step 5: Save Word Document and Screenshots**
- Save the Word document and screenshots to the shared Z drive:
- Operations/Accounting Services/Accounting Services/Void check_Stop pay/2Void Stop Pays/Year Void Stop Pays/Month Void Stops
**Additional Information:**

- If one of the individuals on the refund check is now deceased, you can stop payment and reissue a refund check payable to both the living person and ""The Estate of"" the deceased person.","kaD4T000000Co6nUAC
kaD4T000000XhogUAC
kaD4T000000CnsjUAC"

14. Select 'Submit Endorsement'",Used article kaD4T000000TNE4UAO to come up with the content.,pass,Farmers Specialty Auto,"To remove a vehicle from the policy:
- Send a signed request to Service Operations or your agent.
- If the caller is an agent, confirm they received a signed insured request to drop the vehicle.
- If the caller is a customer, inform them that a signed request is needed.
- Search the policy and select ""Remove Total Loss Vehicle"" to remove a total loss vehicle.
- Log into BWProducers.com and select ""Delete Vehicle"" on the appropriate vehicle.
- Verify that you have obtained the signed request over the phone or process the change yourself.
Note: You cannot remove a vehicle from a canceled policy.","kaD4T0000008Uy1UAE

Customer received an expired Credit Card Letter,"Approximately 5-6K letters mailed on 10/11.  This was a one-time clean up mailing for all customers who had or have an upcoming credit card expiration.  The company advised in the letter for the customer to disregard the notice if the insured has already provided updated information. Due to data limitations, the company was not able to verify if customers banking information was recently updated. If customer questions why a letter was received, apologize and advise the customer to disregard.

Going forward, an Expired CC Outbound dialer will notify customers (approximately 1000 a month) that the credit card is about to expire. (If the expiration date is not updated the payment will decline.)

If there are any questions, please contact a Supervisor.",kaD4T000000PL2hUAG,"kaD4T000000PL2hUAG,kaD4T000000PGL5UAO,kaD4T000000PGatUAG,kaD4T000000PGb0UAG,kaD4T000000PG5bUAG"," This was a one-time clean up mailing for all customers who had or have an upcoming credit card expiration. The company advised in the letter for the customer to disregard the notice if the insured has already provided updated information. Due to data limitations, the company was not able to verify if customers banking information was recently updated. If customer questions why a letter was received, apologize and advise the customer to disregard. ",Missed few points but answered the question,partial pass,Farmers HI,"**Expired Credit Card Letters**
- Expired credit card letters are automatically sent to customers with autopay set up for their credit card.
- The letters notify customers that their credit card is about to expire.
- If a customer receives a letter and questions why, apologize and advise them to disregard the letter.",kaD4T000000PL2hUAG

Where can I see if a service charge is being applied?,"The Installment Schedule screen displays the amount due by policy with each future installment in the current term, and how the amount was determined by policy. The schedule only displays future installments and does not include any current amounts or historical data. Working in conjunction with the Transaction Breakdown screen, which presents the current and historical data, these two screens provide a complete picture of the account by showing what has been billed, what is currently due today, and what will bill in the future.

The Installment Schedule displays the future schedule as of today and is subject to changes as account and policy-level changes are made.",kaD4T000000H69QUAS,"kaD4T0000008XjEUAU,kaD4T000000Gyi9UAC,kaD1L000000GtSAUA0,kaD4T000000HJaXUAW,kaD4T000000XaYeUAK"," The Declarations Page will show the Fire Department Service Charge

and any additional coverages. ",The answer is clear for Fire Dpt Service Changes. There is another article talks about service chargers,partial pass,Commercial,- You can use the Transaction Breakdown screen to see if a service charge is being applied.,kaD4T000000H69QUAS

,Article ""kaD4T00000008TmUAI"" has 3 MCO for state of NY. Answer only listed first MCO",partial pass,Bristol West,"**New York MCO Requirements:**
- The MCO for New York is 41.
- To confirm coverage, the registered owner must be listed as:
- The primary named insured.
- An additional named insured in MCO 41/42.
- In MCO 46, the Primary Registered Owner field on the vehicle screen must match the MVF request.","kaD4T000000CnsnUAC

Can I cancel a Foremost policy by Chat?,Any variations of yes,kaD4T000000XbrhUAC,"kaD4T000000XbrhUAC,kaD4T000000XbiGUAS,kaD4T000000XmLCUA0,kaD4T000000XnffUAC,kaD4T0000009ThgUAE"," Yes, First and Second named insureds or individuals with control, including additional named insureds, POAs and EOEs are allowed to verbally cancel any product in any state (Except Delaware).
Louisiana Special Process: The state of Louisiana requires a written request to be documented as part of the policy record.

Delaware Special Process: For Motorcycle and Motor Home policies being cancelled by insured request, Chat cancellations are not acceptable. The insured must complete the Delaware Cancellation Affidavit (Form 8146) in place of a Chat request, and it must be returned to Foremost.
Washington Special Process: A specific Chat cancellation script is not required, a clear request to cancel a policy can be received without specific formatting or phrasing.

Chat Cancellations may be done without additional documentation for Property and Casualty Products within 30 of the cancel request date (number of days applies when backdating only). When counting back the days, do not include the current day in the calculation.
Once the the 30-day time frame has passed, Advocates can still send the Chat cancellation script and collect a Yes answer, but appropriate supporting documents need to be received.
,Missing several notes and an important bullet point.  ,partial pass,Specialty,Sure, here's the reformatted answer:
**How to cancel a Foremost policy:**
**Within 30 days of the cancel request date:**
- You can cancel a Property and Casualty policy by chat without additional documentation.
- You can also cancel a policy verbally without additional documentation.
**After 30 days of the cancel request date:**
- You must complete the Delaware Cancellation Affidavit (Form 8146) in place of a chat request.","kaD4T000000XbrhUAC
kaD4T000000XbiGUAS"
How do I  process a rush request for a letter of experience loss history letter?,"Rush Requests:

column2: Retrieve claims information.
See How to Look Up Foremost Claims
Only retrieve claims information back 5 years for property and 3 years for casualty as that is what is utilized in loss history letters
Create loss history letter.

column1: a.

column1: b.

For direct customers (USAA and non-AARP): Choose FISC 3 for Loss History with Claims or FISC 2 for Loss History without Claims.
For AARP direct customers: Choose one of the forms from AARP 3 through 8.

column1: o

column1: o

column1: x.

What is the process if insured wants total anual premium?,"From the main page of ForemostSTAR, click on the 'Search/Change Quote or Policy' tab.
Enter the 10-digit policy number in the 'Quote/Policy Number' field. Click ""Search"".
In the pop-up, click the radio button next to ""View Policy"", and click ""Go"".
Select the 'Billing' tab.

Scroll down to see the Total Policy Premium. ",kaD4T0000009EeAUAU,"kaD1L000000CdZpUAK,kaD1L000000L4gtUAC,kaD4T000000GmhKUAS,kaD4T000000PFBYUA4,kaD4T000000XnP2UAK"," To get the total annual premium, you can follow these steps:
1. Multiply the base premium by the rating factor.
2. Add the base premium and the rating factor together.
3. Multiply the sum by the policy period.
4. Add the policy fee to the product of the sum and the policy period.
5. Add the state tax to the sum of the policy fee and the product of the sum and the policy period.

6. The total annual premium is the sum of the state tax and the sum of the policy fee and the product of the sum and the policy period. ",Generic. Information not found in article,fail,Specialty,"**Specialty Dwelling Policies:**
**In FOCUS (PPPR):**
1. Type ""IN"" in TRAN CODE and the policy number in NUMBER, then press enter.
2. Type ""COV"" in the COMMAND line and press enter.
3. The TOTAL POLICY PREM will be displayed in the upper right corner of the screen, directly below PRODUCER.
**In ForemostSTAR (P2N):**
1. Enter the ten-digit policy number in the ""Retrieve Quote or Policy"" tab.
2. Click on the ""Billing"" tab.
3. Scroll down the page to ""Billing Information.""
4. The total policy premium (excluding taxes and fees) will be located next to ""Total Policy Premium.""
**Casualty Policies:**
**In ForemostSTAR:**
1. Enter the ten-digit policy number in the ""Retrieve Quote or Policy"" tab.
2. Click on the ""Coverages"" tab.
3. The ""Total 1 Year Premium"" will be displayed in the bottom right-hand corner.",kaD4T0000004JS0UAM
How do I process a trampline in A360?,"Processing in Agent360 via PolicyCenter:
1. Pull up the policy via PolicyCenter
2. Ask the Customer / Agent the questions above regarding the trampoline and how it is used.
3. Click on the Action dropdown to start a new change.
4. Enter the effective date, what you are processing and who is initiating the change.
5. Via Chat Assist, reach out to Underwriting to have them select Yes for the Trampoline, since Service Ops doesn't have the access.
Once the information has been updated, there could be additional questions from Underwriting asked about the trampoline.
6. Quote the change and Issue.
7. If an Umbrella exists, make sure to add the trampoline to that policy as well.

8. Document - Agent360 - Documentation (/articles/Knowledge/Agent360-Documentation)",kaD4T000000PN9uUAG,"kaD4T000000PN9uUAG,kaD4T000000L47CUAS,kaD4T000000XcONUA0,kaD4T000000L4B9UAK,kaD4T000000L498UAC"," For Service: Access Company Use page in ARS under Residence Questions section, choose yes radio button for the Trampoline question.
For Sales: Under Property Information select the Yes radio button for the Trampoline question.
Submit endorsement. ","Asked for A360 process but received ARS process. Article has the word Agent360, question has A360",fail,FWS,"To process a trampoline in A360:
1. Locate the trampoline question.
2. Select the ""Yes"" radio button.",kaD4T000000PN9uUAG

How do I fix the issue where the Agent cannot enter a payment through their ACA?,"Resolution

column2: First, attempt to use the agent's district manager's agent code.
The district manager's agent code will be the same besides the last two digits, which will be 01.

column1: o
column2: Example: Agent = 45-32-31                 District Manager = 45-32-01

If this has not happened, and the Inactive agents ACA still shows on the billing side of express, please refer for defect 724086.
If this does not correct the issue, use one of the ACA codes below and notate the billing account on what code was used for payment:

column1: o
column2: Western Zone  29-99-375

column1: o
column2: Eastern Zone  04-99-375
Note: Please make sure to document which ACA code you use in your billing comment so the payment can be located if necessary.

column1: a.
column2: While entering, confirm all forms required for printing have been selected, this will be reflected with an X.  If a form was not automatically selected type x next to the form number and continue entering until reaching the E4277 screen as shown below.
Reference the Consistent Wording Collection Page to determine the appropriate transaction type and wording
Type X under the correct description of operations that matches the transaction type be performed.
Enter until reaching the Description of Changes fields
Type the description of change using the consistent wording from step 5.

NOTE: Consistent wording for some transactions may not be referenced in the Consistent Wording.  If this occurs, please use sound judgment in wording, or reach out to local floor support for guidance.

Each field has a 65 character limitation.  This is noted on the bottom right corner of the screen. If the number of characters exceeds allowable space, verbiage will be cut off during the document print process.
Always place cursor on the last character typed to confirm you have not gone past the 65 character limit.
Press PF9  to reach the Policy Data for Issue screen
Tab to the Data Option field and Type 1 and then select Enter to continue. This will take you back to the Modify Control screen.

column1: Modify Control screen:

column2: Type 9  Exit in the option field, press enter

column1: Modification Control screen:

column2: Verify status of Bypass Und.

column1: a.
column2: If Bypass Und is blank, Enter 1 at Starting Point and type U next to Bypass Und., press Enter through the Mailing/Billing screens until back at the Modification Control screen

column1: Policy Premium Recap screen:

column2: To submit the change at the bottom of the screen type 9, press enter.
On the premium recap screen confirm the premium adjustment is accurate. Press Enter

column1: a.
column2: Note: The premium recap screen will look di9fferent based on if there is a premium change or no premium change

column1: IF PROVIDING A QUOTE ONLY, NOT SUBMITTING THE CHANGE: after noting the premium change, STOP do not push the change through! Tab to the bottom and input OPTION 1 = SUSPND to suspend the change and follow Multi-Line: CLS Processing & Navigation - How do I delete a Work In Progress (WIP)? To delete.
Disposition screen:

column2: On the Disposition screen complete the following information:
Policy Documents and SCHED Print options  Entry is subject to what is outlined in the Consistent Wording Chapters. Consistent Wording Collection Page
Renewal Option Prefilled with A-Automatic or U-Underwritten

Note: User can override with U if policy requires underwriting review at renewal due to findings during review of requested change. Follow Multi-Line: Flagging Policies for Review at Renewal - How to Set a D Disposition in CLS and Multi-Line: Flagging Policies for Review at Renewal - How to Set a Caution Code in CLS
Press Enter to complete the transaction

In SRM write your comments and select the checkbox for Policy System so the comments are copied into the journal comments. What is metcheck?,Exception Refund (MetCheck)
column2: A paper check refund that a remittance associate processes manually.,kaD4T000000XnbWUAS,"kaD4T000000XnbWUAS,kaD4T000000HK5pUAG,kaD4T000000PMhiUAG,kaD4T000000PLUMUA4,kaD4T0000004dHaUAI"," Metcheck is a system used by Farmers Insurance to track the status of disbursements. Disbursements are payments made to customers, such as refunds or claims. Metcheck allows customer service agents to track the status of these payments and provide customers with updates.  It shows the history of the disbursement, including the amount, the date it was issued, the method of payment, and the status of the payment. ",Information not found in article,fail,FWS,"MetCheck is a refund system used by Agent360.

column1: Here's a breakdown of the key points:

What do I do if Returned mail doesn't contain a policy or account number?,"Search the returned document for any insured information, such as a valid policy, account number, or address.
Use Agency Dashboard to research for policy info.  Direct Bill Inquiry can also be used to look up account numbers (F numbers).
If you cannot find either number, make comments in the SR and then close with this comment:

RECEIVED RETURNED MAIL. CANNOT LOCATE POLICY OR ACCOUNT NUMBER. CLOSING SR.",kaD4T000000Xh5zUAC,"kaD4T000000Xh5zUAC,kaD4T000000GqyfUAC,kaD4T000000HDDrUAO,kaD4T000000bpjwUAA,kaD4T000000Xd3ZUAS"," Make comments in the SR and then close SR.
